member.name: T:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches
member.summary: This class allows access to the settings for the market place. Available settings are: MarketPlaceEnabled - Enables/Disables all features involving exchange (items, currency, bonuses...) ItemsXchangeEnabled - Enables/Disables the items exchange feature (sells/purchases) LoginBonusEnabled - Enables/Disables the login bonus feature TrafficBonusEnabled- Enables/Disables the traffic bonus feature LoginBonusValue - Sets the amount of Tickets that will be given away for every login TrafficBonusValue - Sets the amount of Tickets that will be given away for traffic into a player's site

member.name: P:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches.IsMarketPlaceEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is market place enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is market place enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches.IsItemsXchangeEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is items xchange enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is items xchange enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches.IsItemResaleEnabled
member.summary: Enables users to resell items

member.name: P:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches.IsLoginBonusEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is login bonus enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is login bonus enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Roblox.Economy.Business_Logic.MarketPlaceSwitches.IsTrafficBonusEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is traffic bonus enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is traffic bonus enabled; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets the login bonus award.

member.name: M:Roblox.Economy.UserLoginAward.TryAward
member.summary:
Checks if the user should receive the login reward, and if so proceeds to reward (and updates records).
NOTE: Currently this method doesn't actually reward anything, because what used to be rewarded is a deprecated feature and the quantity to reward had been set to 0 since 2016.
